segments.text: I notice the water is just pouring over the edge of the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman doesn’t seem to care at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is already wet, but she keeps drying that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are taking advantage of her distraction.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That boy is going to fall if he doesn’t stop reaching like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is so unstable, and he’s not even paying attention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting for a cookie, completely unaware of the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will notice before it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful compared to this chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I should say something, but I don’t want to ruin the moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is a recipe for disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR
